definitions.definition: a seed, or pod containing seeds, of a climbing plant, eaten as a vegetable. There are several types of bean and the plants that they grow on are also called beans.

examples.text: She grows her own broad beans.

definitions.definition: a seed from a coffee plant, or some other plants
something that is not worth much
to know nothing about a subject

examples.text: I don’t know beans about making movies.

definitions.definition: to tell somebody something that should be kept secret or private

examples.text: We don't want to spill the beans yet.
She made the mistake of spilling the tea on her sister's love life.

wordOrigin: Old English bēan, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch boon and German Bohne.
